TopicTitle: The S.S. Scrub Crash3r, a speedboat capable of 125.6 m/s

Articles.Content:
This is my first time posting on the forum, since I wanted to develop a vehicle worthy of being posted and I have finally created it.

Max Speed: 125.6 (452.16 km/h!)

Normal Cruising Speed: 94.6 (nothing breaks and can go at 4x time warp)

Range: Almost 1000 km at normal cruising speed

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9drysojskcjexsl/S_S_%20Scrub%20Crash3r.craft

Edit: The craft does not have wheels or parachutes attached. If you want to use the craft you must make a way to get to water.

Edited November 30, 2013 by communistpony
